comment: Easy class- but she is very annoying and while the class was about the Global Revolution/Challenges, she went off about different things and tells irrelevant stories. Would've received a higher grade in participation (even though I always talked) if I wasn't very sick and missed two weeks (with note from school to stay out of class). Avoid.
One of the best teachers ever. Super hot. WIsh I could call her. Class was easy overall.
Class is easy. She reviews before the test so you really dont have to do the reading. you do have to write a research paper and do a group project, but they arent too hard

Professor Maynard is amazing. She is their to help you and will review everything before a test. She opens your eyes to the many different things going on in our world. She is very interesting and appreciates participation in the classroom. She is a great teacher and shows lots of movies.

This teacher is annoying, she thinks she can save the world and everyone should listen to her stories about her freakin daughters. She is easy but can get on nerves. If you talk to her she will be easy. Just reply in class and she will give you a good grade. She is ok.

she was pretty cool, and hot. was helpful throughout the semester on classwork assignments and projects. plus she gives a relaxed feeling in the class so people are cracking jokes getting to know one another. cool chill teacher

She is an awesome teacher. When we go over test, she always reviews. If you fail this class something is wrong. All you have to do is put in a little effort and you'll get an A. She tries to get all students involved and to relate it to us somehow. TAKE HER!
